alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Robertson; Sumner; Trousdale; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:12AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Davidson, Sumner, northwestern Wilson, Cheatham, Trousdale and Robertson Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Portland to 12 miles west of Ashland City. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Springfield, Ashland City, Hartsville, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Kingston Springs, Lakewood, Pegram, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Portland and Old Hickory. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 191 and 193, and between mile markers 199 and 209. Interstate 65 between mile markers 85 and 118. Interstate 24 between mile markers 18 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cheatham; Davidson; Robertson; Sumner; Trousdale; Wilson
